name: Estranged (MetricZero, zoped, tfx)
description:
Move forward and don't let discouragement stop you,
for the universe awaits!
Your whole life you've been told by Grandma 
that nothing else is out there.
But now more than ever, you're determined to
prove her wrong and make your own way!
You've made a ship. Now all you have to do is take flight!

Controls:
AD = Character Movement
E = Enter
Space = Launch

Entry Info:
This project was made in a little under 24 hours to explore the theme
"Limited Space" presented by the BenBonk Game Jam #2.

Credits:
Zoped (https://zoped.itch.io/)
SaltMonger (https://saltmonger.itch.io/)
MetricZero (https://metriczero.itch.io/)
